item.title: 世界塑料问题日益严重
item.description: 塑料污染已经很严重了，而且只会越来越严重。严重得多。【原文：Plastic pollution is already bad, and it’s only slated to get worse. A lot worse.】

item.title: 印度利用煤炭发电厂为电网中更多太阳能发电腾出空间
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度希望煤电厂投资升级，使其能够以较低的产能正常工作，从而为可再生能源在电力结构中占据更大份额创造空间。【原文：India wants coal plants to invest in upgrades that would to allow them to work regularly at a lower capacity, creating space for a greater share of renewables in the power mix, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 被央行广泛采用的气候研究因错误而撤回
item.description: 一项计算气候变化对全球经济影响的研究被广泛引用，但在受到同行批评后被撤回。【原文：A widely-referenced study that calculated the impacts of climate change on the global economy has been retracted after criticism from peers.】

item.title: 烟雾笼罩河内，河内下令紧急遏制有毒空气
item.description: 越南首都再次出现有毒烟雾，整个城市被烟雾笼罩，当局呼吁有呼吸道疾病的居民留在室内，同时制定了解决空气污染的紧急措施。【原文：Toxic smog has returned to Vietnam’s capital, blanketing the city and prompting authorities to urge residents with respiratory conditions to stay indoors while setting out urgent measures to tackle air pollution.】

item.title: 波兰电网负责人敦促暂停成本高昂的海上风电扩张
item.description: 波兰电网运营商负责人表示，为了在全球经济中保持竞争力，波兰应优先考虑成本更低的陆地风能，而不是海上项目。【原文：Poland should prioritize cheaper land wind energy over offshore projects to stay competitive in the global economy, according to the head of the country’s power grid operator.】

item.title: 研究发现：到 2040 年，全球塑料过剩问题将更加严重
item.description:
一项新的分析发现，在一切照旧的情况下，全球塑料产量将增加 52% 。【原文：

A new analysis finds that global plastic production will increase by 52% in a business-as-usual scenario. 

】

item.title: Vulcan 筹资 25 亿美元资助德国锂项目
item.description: 由澳大利亚矿业大亨吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）支持的锂和地热生产商 Vulcan Energy Resources Ltd. 在一份交易所文件中表示，该公司已获得 39 亿澳元（约合 25 亿美元）的融资，用于为德国的一个项目提供全部资金。【原文：Vulcan Energy Resources Ltd., a lithium and geothermal producer backed by Australian mining tycoon Gina Rinehart, has secured A$3.9 billion ($2.5 billion) of financing to fully fund a project in Germany, it said in an exchange filing.】

item.title: 特朗普将重新考虑对新英格兰海上风电场的批准
item.description: 特朗普政府周二提出申请，要求联邦法官允许其重新考虑批准马萨诸塞州沿海的新英格兰风能 1 号项目计划。【原文：The Trump administration filed its request Tuesday asking a federal judge to allow it to reconsider approval of the New England Wind 1 project planned off the coast of Massachusetts.】

item.title: 盖茨支持的核电开发商即将建造反应堆
item.description: TerraPower LLC 预计在完成关键监管步骤后，将于第二季度开始在怀俄明州建造一座下一代核反应堆。【原文：TerraPower LLC expects to begin construction on a next-generation nuclear reactor in Wyoming by the second quarter after completing key regulatory steps.】

item.title: 美国寻求电力供应，沃尔玛提供备用发电机
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，美国正在寻求利用全国用于数据中心、大卖场和其他地方的大型工业柴油发电机网络，以帮助抑制不断上涨的电力成本，支持人工智能带来的电力需求激增。【原文：The US is looking to tap the nation’s network of large industrial diesel generators used at data centers, big box stores and elsewhere to help curb rising electricity costs and support the surge in power demand from artificial intelligence, according to Energy Secretary Chris Wright.】

item.title: 泰国计划在气候法中引入排放交易和碳税
item.description: 泰国政府根据该国首部正式的气候变化立法，制定了新的碳税和排放交易系统计划。【原文：Thailand’s government set out plans for new carbon taxes and an emissions trading system under the country’s first formal climate change legislation.】

item.title: 大雪袭击新英格兰北部地区，纽约市周二将面临湿滑天气
item.description: 由于一场快速移动的冬季暴风雪给纽约市北部和东部带来大雪，周二纽约市将变得湿漉漉的，这增加了航空公司航班延误的风险，并使整个东北部内陆地区的地面交通受阻。【原文：New York City will be soggy Tuesday as a fast moving winter storm brings heavy snow north and east of the city, raising the risk of airline delays and snarling ground traffic across the interior Northeast.】

item.title: 汤姆-斯泰尔的投资公司填补了私人信贷领域的空白
item.description: 私人信贷市场的规模约为 1.7 万亿美元，投资者对它的兴趣只增不减。在硅谷银行于 2023 年倒闭之后，风险债务是市场中尚未迎来繁荣时期的一个领域，尤其是对清洁技术公司而言。【原文：The private credit market stands at roughly $1.7 trillion, and investor interest in it is only intensifying. Venture debt is one area of the market that hasn’t seen boom times, especially for clean-tech companies, following the 2023 collapse of Silicon Valley Bank.】

item.title: 欧洲将迎来温和的十二月，但极地漩涡仍是焦点
item.description: 据预测，12 月大部分时间欧洲都将出现反常的温暖天气，这将抑制供暖需求，并拖累天然气价格。【原文：Europe is forecast for unseasonably warm weather through much of December, curbing heating demand and weighing on natural gas prices.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚、斯里兰卡和泰国洪灾造成 1,300 多人死亡
item.description: 印尼巴塘托鲁（美联社）— 周二，在上周印尼、斯里兰卡和泰国发生的特大洪水和山体滑坡灾害中，死亡人数超过1300人，近千人失踪。【原文：BATANG TORU, Indonesia (AP) — Emergency crews raced to reach survivors and recover more bodies Tuesday as the death toll from last week’s catastrophic floods and landslides surged past 1,300 in Indonesia, Sri Lanka and Thailand, with nearly 1,000 people missing.】

item.title: 雨水推迟收获期，越南咖啡仍将丰收
item.description: 据一个行业组织称，尽管暴雨和大范围的洪水延误了咖啡的收获，但越南仍有望获得四年来最大的咖啡收成。【原文：Vietnam remains on track for its biggest coffee crop in four years, despite bouts of heavy rain and widespread flooding delaying the harvest, according to an industry group.】

item.title: 部长称台湾可能在 2028 年重启核电站
item.description: 台湾一位政府部长表示，如果安全审查进展顺利，台湾可能会在 2028 年重启一座原子能发电厂，这再次表明台湾可能会扭转其反核政策。【原文：Taiwan may restart one of its atomic power plants in 2028 if safety reviews proceed smoothly, a government minister said, in another sign the island may reverse its anti-nuclear policy.】

item.title: 特朗普将 "可再生能源 "从国家可再生能源实验室中删除
item.description: 特朗普政府正在将国家可再生能源实验室更名为落基山脉国家实验室，这是其对与清洁能源有关的联邦实体重新定性的最新举措。【原文：The Trump administration is renaming the National Renewable Energy Laboratory the National Laboratory of the Rockies, in its latest move to re-characterize federal entities associated with clean energy.】

item.title: 前安都兰碳公司老板刘易斯加入气候融资伙伴公司
item.description: Climate Finance Partners 聘用 Andurand Capital Management LLP 的前研究主管兼投资组合经理 Mark Lewis 为合伙人兼董事总经理。【原文：Climate Finance Partners hired Andurand Capital Management LLP’s former head of research and portfolio manager Mark Lewis as partner and managing director.】

item.title: 联邦紧急事务管理局让举报人复职后不久即放假
item.description: 联邦紧急事务管理局（Federal Emergency Management Agency）的一些员工公开签署了一封举报信，对政府的备灾工作表示担忧，该局在恢复这些员工的职务几天后，又让他们重新休行政假。【原文：Days after reinstating a group of Federal Emergency Management Agency employees who publicly signed a whistleblower letter raising concerns about the government’s disaster preparedness, the agency has placed those workers back on administrative leave.】

item.title: 西班牙要求电信公司建立备份以避免停机
item.description: 西班牙政府将强制要求西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）和 Cellnex Telecom SA 等当地电信公司安装备用电源系统，以确保在重大灾难期间提供电话和互联网服务。【原文：Spain’s government is set to mandate that local telecommunications firms such as Telefónica SA and Cellnex Telecom SA install power backup systems to ensure phone and internet services during major disasters.】

item.title: 举报信调查结束后，联邦紧急事务管理局命令员工返岗
item.description: 联邦紧急事务管理局已下令一批员工重返工作岗位，此前他们曾因公开提出对该机构救灾能力的担忧而于 8 月份被放假— 随后又被解雇一人— 。【原文：The Federal Emergency Management Agency has ordered a group of employees to return to work after placing them on leave in August — and later dismissing one — for publicly raising concerns about the agency’s disaster-response capabilities.】

item.title: 改变游戏规则的 "猫债券 "激励改编游戏
item.description: 随着气候变化造成的损失不断加剧，保险公司正陷入困境。房主也是如此。显然，必须有所改变。【原文：Insurers are struggling as climate change-fueled damage intensifies. So are homeowners. Clearly something has to change.】

item.title: 超级屋顶 "如何回报保险公司、猫债投资者和房主
item.description:
投资者抢购与北卡罗来纳州房主及其保险公司安装超级屋顶有关的巨灾债券。【原文：

Investors snapped up a catastrophe bond tied to North Carolina homeowners and their insurer for installing super roofs.

】

item.title: 天合光能推动储能技术发展，提前实现业绩扭亏为盈
item.description: 天合光能公司是中国最大的太阳能制造商之一，随着该公司向蓬勃发展的储能领域多元化发展，预计其经营业绩将比同行更早复苏。【原文：Trina Solar Co., one of the largest solar manufacturers in China, anticipates an earlier recovery in its business performance than industry peers, as it diversifies into the booming energy storage sector.】

item.title: 中国太阳能行业持续低迷，晶澳太阳能就专利纠纷达成和解
item.description: 中国四大太阳能公司之一的晶澳太阳能科技有限公司（JA Solar Technology Co.【原文：JA Solar Technology Co., one of China’s top four solar companies, said it agreed to settle patent lawsuits with a domestic rival, a sign that manufacturers in the country are opting for cooperation to survive an industry-wide downturn.】

item.title: 强风暴造成东南亚斯里兰卡近千人死亡
item.description: 亚洲部分地区的恶劣天气已造成近 1,000 人丧生，其中印度尼西亚和斯里兰卡受暴雨、洪水和山体滑坡的影响最为严重。【原文：Severe weather across parts of Asia has claimed nearly 1,000 lives, with Indonesia and Sri Lanka among the worst affected by heavy rainfall, flooding and landslides.】

item.title: 腐败丑闻后全球基金严查菲律宾债务
item.description: 一些资产管理公司正在审查其在菲律宾政府气候和社会目标专项债务上的风险敞口，因为他们担心这些债务可能无意中为因贪污而受到调查的项目提供了资金。【原文：A number of asset managers are reviewing their exposure to Philippine government debt earmarked for climate and social objectives, amid concerns they may have inadvertently financed projects under investigation for graft.】

item.title: 押注巨额收益失败后，诉讼金融遭遇困境
item.description: 今年的诉讼金融形势不容乐观。【原文：Litigation finance is having a bad year.】

item.title: Eon 首席执行官敦促德国在电网紧张的情况下放慢推进风能和太阳能的步伐
item.description: 德国公用事业公司 EON SE 的负责人表示，欧洲最大的经济体应放慢风能和太阳能扩张的步伐，称该国的电网正在努力应对新可再生能源项目的激增。【原文：The head of German utility EON SE said Europe’s largest economy should slow the pace of wind and solar expansion, saying the country’s power grids are struggling to cope with the surge in new renewable projects.】
